Author: dontyell_atme
Text: :( that must be hard. I really hope it will get easier for you in the future. Feel free to dm me.   I bet you already know this, but there is medication that can help with pain with mental causes. A friend of mine had headaches for years everyday and her psychiatrist gave her this medication and she doesn't have the headaches anymore.

Author: justathrowawayyall
Text: I don't know if it will mean much but I know how it feels to have doctors ignore and you act like you're just making everything up. Sometimes you try really hard and it's still almost impossible to get help. But I'm glad you're still here, and I hope something changes so that things can improve. You deserve to recover and be happy.
